page_content: The page discusses the online availability of historical church records for family research in the Canton of St.Gallen.
The page discusses the successful completion of J+S snow sports training courses in the Canton of St.Gallen for the winter of 2019/2020.
The page provides information on hazard maps in the Canton of St.Gallen, detailing potential natural risks like floods and landslides.
The page reports on the acquisition of Xmatik AG by Egeli Informatik, expanding their software solutions for transport and logistics.
The page provides information on heavy traffic and hazardous goods regulations, as well as the responsibilities of the traffic police in the Canton of St.Gallen.
The page discusses changes in the minimum employment requirements for companies applying for hardship measures in the Canton of St.Gallen.
The page discusses the transition to RDA (Resource Description and Access) in public libraries in the Canton of St.Gallen, focusing on the use of the "winMedio.net" software.
